SELECT T.ID id, T.NODE_ID nodeId, T.CHECK_RULE checkRule, T.OBJ_DATA_ID dataItemId, T.BIZ_OBJ_ID objectId, S.NODE_NAME nodeName, S.NODE_NO nodeSerialNo, S.DOMAIN_ID domainId, R.CODE objectCode, R.NAME objectName, N.PROCESS_NAME processName, '0' newData, T.SORT_NO sortNo, M.NAME dataItemName FROM CAP_BIZ_NODE_CONSTRAINT T, CAP_BIZ_PROCESS_NODE S, CAP_BIZ_OBJ_INFO R, CAP_BIZ_OBJ_DATA_ITEM M, CAP_BIZ_PROCESS_INFO N
,(SELECT * FROM CAP_BIZ_DOMAIN WHERE FIND_IN_SET( ID, CONVERT (F_CAP_GetDomainChildrenId(#{domainId} ) USING utf8) )) T2
WHERE T.NODE_ID = S.ID AND T.OBJ_DATA_ID = M.ID AND T.BIZ_OBJ_ID = R.ID AND N.ID=S.PROCESS_ID
AND S.DOMAIN_ID=T2.ID
AND (T.NODE_ID = #{nodeId})
AND (T.OBJ_DATA_ID = #{dataItemId})
AND (T.BIZ_OBJ_ID = #{objectId})
AND (N.DOMAIN_ID = #{domainId}) AND (S.DOMAIN_ID = #{domainId}) AND (R.DOMAIN_ID = #{domainId})
ORDER BY T.SORT_NO ASC

SELECT T.ID id, T.NODE_ID nodeId, T.CHECK_RULE checkRule, T.OBJ_DATA_ID dataItemId, T.BIZ_OBJ_ID objectId, S.NODE_NAME nodeName, S.NODE_NO nodeSerialNo, S.DOMAIN_ID domainId, R.CODE objectCode, R.NAME objectName, R.PACKAGE_ID objectPackageId, N.PROCESS_NAME processName, '0' newData, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM+1 sortIndex, T.SORT_NO sortNo, M.NAME dataItemName FROM CAP_BIZ_NODE_CONSTRAINT T, CAP_BIZ_PROCESS_NODE S, CAP_BIZ_OBJ_INFO R, CAP_BIZ_OBJ_DATA_ITEM M, CAP_BIZ_PROCESS_INFO N, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE T.NODE_ID = S.ID AND T.OBJ_DATA_ID = M.ID AND T.BIZ_OBJ_ID = R.ID AND N.ID=S.PROCESS_ID AND (T.NODE_ID = #{nodeId}) ORDER BY T.SORT_NO ASC
